title: Turret Hug Solo if Support is AFK/Trolling or Troll other lanes?

replies.body: Turret hug and do the best you can, but make sure u place a pink @ the bush behind your turret. Don't overstay to protect dying turret and freeze lane to close the gap between u and ur opponents. Remember to ping mia if you only see one opponent @ bot lane. If the support is trolling then dont say " it's k we can still do this", this'll make the support troll even harder. Pretend you're suffering hard so the troll will sit back and laugh.
